attributes.action: Remove from office the North Wales Police Chief Richard Brunstrom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to a recent press conference held by North Wales Police Chief Richard Brunstrom, where a powerpoint presentation contained images and details of a road crash that involved a motorcyclist and a car with the result of the death of the motorcylist.

Please refer to artice on MCN website as details are too sick to place here.

http://www.motorcyclenews.com/MCN/News/newsresults/mcn/2007/April/apr23-30/apr2607sickbrunstromparadesheadlessbiker/

Please sign this petition to stop this dictatorship continuing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
